SEARCH
Package com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.repository

Class BaseRepository<T,D,E extends Exception>

java.lang.Object
com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.repository.BaseRepository<T,D,E>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity type
D - the type of the entity's id
E - the type of exception that can be thrown
Direct Known Subclasses:
JpaAuthorRepository, JpaBookRepository, JpaLoanRepository, JpaMemberRepository
public abstract class BaseRepository<T,D,E extends Exception> extends Object
A base repository class that provides basic CRUD operations for entities.
